Detailed Description

Data available for every mouse event. In addition, every mouse event supports IAVGEvent.

Member Function Documentation

IAVGNode IAVGMouseEvent::getElement (   ) 
 

Returns the element that was under the mouse when the event happened.

Member Data Documentation

readonly attribute long IAVGMouseEvent::button
 

Contains the button that caused the event.
